boil_water_robot.setting: Robot can only touch objects within the range of gripper contact. The robot has two grippers and thus the robot can hold two objects at most simultaneously.

cabinet.setting: This cabinet is a manual door opening cabinet. Things in the cabinet can be retrieved when the door of the cabinet is opened.

stove.setting: This stove is a manual stove to boil things. The stove can be turned on regardless of whether there is anything on the stove or not.

state_description.type: the type of the robot or object, e.g., robot, cube, table, etc.
state_description.position: the 3D position of the robot or object, e.g., [4.0, 6.0, -2.0]
state_description.size: the size of the robot or object, e.g., size of an apple is 0.1
state_description.gripper_content: the content in the gripper of the robot. It is a nested list that represent the affliation relationship of objects. e.g., [], [['bowl']], [['fruit_tray',['apple']]]
state_description.setting: the role setting of the robot or object, e.g., 'Robot can only touch objects within the range of gripper contact.'
state_description.gripper_contact_range: the range of robot gripper contact, e.g., 0.5
state_description.door_state: the state of the door, e.g., 'Open' or 'Closed'
state_description.content: the content in the corresponding object. It is a nested list that represent the affliation relationship of objects. e.g., [], [['bowl']], [['fruit_tray',['apple']]]
state_description.water_temperature: the temperature of the water in the kettle, e.g., 'Room_temperature' or 'Boiled'
state_description.power_state: the state of the stove, e.g., 'On' or 'Off'
state_description.kettle_on_stove: whether the kettle is on the stove
